actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs, S. Rept. 94-751.
Placed on calendar in Senate under Subjects on the Table.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: An original bill to recognize the National Credit Union Administration.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Credit Union Act to establish an independent agency in the executive branch to be known as the National Credit Union Administration. Provides that the management of such Administration will rest in the National Credit Union Administration Board. States that there will be three members on such Board, who will have six-year terms of office.

titles.title: An original bill to recognize the National Credit Union Administration.
